scn fbmwbmCeremony2Script
short DoOnce
Begin GameMode
	if(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 == 25)&&(Player.GetDistance fbmwbmChestClawFangREF < 512)&&(DoOnce == 0)
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn1.MoveToMarker fbmwbmHunterSpawnPointRef
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn2.MoveToMarker fbmwbmHunterSpawnPointRef1
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn3.MoveToMarker fbmwbmHunterSpawnPointRef2
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn4.MoveToMarker fbmwbmHunterSpawnPointRef3
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn5.MoveToMarker fbmwbmHunterSpawnPointRef4
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn1.Enable
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn2.Enable
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn3.Enable
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn4.Enable
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn5.Enable
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn1.evp
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn2.evp
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn3.evp
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn4.evp
		fbmwbmHunterSpawn5.evp
		set DoOnce to 1
	endif
End
